item.title: Simulating die rolls and testing fairness using a Chi-squared test.
item.description: As someone who enjoys playing Dungeons and Dragons, I also get fascinated by the primitive random number generators used it them, the dice. When I talk dice with friends and internet strangers, the conversation sometimes leans towards discussing whether or not their dice are fair. Now if you search for how to test this, you can find a few good answers to explain the various statistical tests that can be used, along with their pros and their cons, so Iâ€™m not going to do that here.
